item.title: Data Mining and Analysis using rtweet package
item.description: Census 2019 in Kenya The 8th 2019 Population and Housing Census started from the night of 24/25th August 2019 and ended on 31st August 2019. Census involved counting of people within the border of Kenya at a specific time. Census is an important process for the Govenrment as it provides evidence for proper planning and resource allocation, policy formulation and targeting of development plans. You can read more about the census here and here

item.title: R markdown errors - not knitting
